CustomField.defaultValue:
"Thank you for contacting EuroDespatch. Following on from our phone conversation, I am writing to confirm the details of your reservation." & BR()&BR()&BR()&
"You should be able to see attached your PDF consignment note. Please either have this available on your mobile device or bring along a printed copy of this along with your Eurostar ticket when dropping off and collecting. " & BR()&BR()&BR()&
"Just to remind you that this booking is exchangeable up to the time of the scheduled departure subject to availability, however, it is non-refundable. "& BR()&BR()&BR()&
"If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to call me on 03448 225822 or you can email Eurodespatch@eurostar.com. "& BR()&BR()&BR()&
"I hope you have a very pleasant trip"
CustomField.label: Booking Confirmation Email Text
